content: **crochet poncho in alpaca with twisted cords and crochet edge in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no z-179 -------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l - xl/xxl finished measurements length at center front approx 37 - 39 - 42 cm / 14 5 - 15 25 - 16 5 **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 200-250-250 gr nr 7120 light seafoam and use drops snow from garnstudio 50-50-50 gr nr 31 pastel blue drops 4 mm / us g and 7 mm / us k crochet hooks or sizes needed to obtain correct gauge
